EmailTemplate.name: R&OI Source Inspection No Cust Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Your order is ready for Source Inspection - PO: {!ROI_Order_Information__c.Purchase_Order_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This email is NOT sent to customer, as Customer's Email ID is missing. Please review this email / attached information on Source Inspection and take further action to inform the Customer accordingly.
For any questions related to this, please contact Honeywell Customer Service.
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: https://myaerospace.honeywell.com
